perturbation.original_text: 1.5 "FIELD OF USE" means, and is limited to, the utilization of the Licensed Technology by the Licensee for the exclusive purpose of fulfilling Spot FX transactions by transmitting market data and orders. The "Field of Use" shall not include any functions or applications not expressly described in the preceding sentence, but shall include functions or applications developed by Licensor to enhance the performance within the "Field of Use".
perturbation.changed_text: 1.5 "FIELD OF USE" means, and is limited to, the utilization of the Licensed Technology by the Licensee for the exclusive purpose of fulfilling Spot FX transactions by transmitting market data and orders. The "Field of Use" shall also include functions or applications not expressly described in the preceding sentence, and may or may not include functions or applications developed by Licensor to enhance the performance within the "Field of Use", as determined by the Licensee.
perturbation.explanation: The original text strictly limits the 'Field of Use' and excludes functions not explicitly described. The modified text broadens the scope to include functions not expressly described and introduces uncertainty by giving the Licensee the power to decide whether functions developed by the Licensor are included, contradicting the Licensor's control over its own technology.

perturbation.original_text: viii. The Licensee acknowledges and understands that accessing the Licensed Technology triggers and constitutes a renewed assumption of such liabilities and risk.
perturbation.changed_text: viii. The Licensee acknowledges and understands that accessing the Licensed Technology may or may not trigger and constitute a renewed assumption of such liabilities and risk, as determined by Licensor.
perturbation.explanation: The original text clearly states that accessing the Licensed Technology automatically triggers a renewed assumption of liabilities and risks. The revised version introduces uncertainty by making this assumption conditional upon the Licensor's determination, contradicting the Licensee's understanding of their responsibilities.

perturbation.original_text: (c) The parties agree that (except for the customization work) (above) all future enhancements to the Software, including any new Revisions, Versions, updates to, or any other non-customized development work regarding the Software (which the Licensee may accept or decline) shall be provided to the Licensee during the term of this Agreement at no additional cost.
perturbation.changed_text: (c) The parties agree that (except for the customization work) (above) all future enhancements to the Software, including any new Revisions, Versions, updates to, or any other non-customized development work regarding the Software (which the Licensee may accept or decline) may be provided to the Licensee during the term of this Agreement and may be subject to additional costs.
perturbation.explanation: The original text states enhancements will be provided at no additional cost. The changed text introduces that enhancements *may* be subject to additional costs, creating a direct contradiction regarding whether these enhancements will be free or not.
